items.content_html: This AI Chatbot project utilizes the Gemini API (by Google) to create an intelligent, real-time conversational assistant for websites. It is designed to simulate human-like conversations, assist users, and provide accurate responses based on natural language input. The project is built with a lightweight front-end using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
items.title: Navitha55/AI-Chatbot: This AI Chatbot project utilizes the Gemini API (by Google) to create an intelligent, real-time conversational assistant for websites. It is designed to simulate human-like conversations, assist users, and provide accurate responses based on natural language input. The project is built with a lightweight front-end using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

items.content_html: A lightweight Web3 learning platform combining bite-sized lessons (5-10 mins) with a decentralized currency knowledge hub. Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.
items.title: Nexacore-Org/ByteChain-Academy: A lightweight Web3 learning platform combining bite-sized lessons (5-10 mins) with a decentralized currency knowledge hub. Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
